name: Bookworm
description: A lover of knowledge, stories, and quiet moments. Bookworms seek answers in pages and often surprise others with their insight.
special_items: An atlas, encyclopedia, or favourite novel
desires: I need to have all the answers
I must live up to my parents’ expectations
I want to rid myself of all my fears
stuff: A library card and some change
An eraser and a folded test report

name: Computer Wizard
description: Tech-savvy and digitally inclined, Computer Wizards navigate the online world with ease and excel in coding, building, and problem solving.
special_items: A trusty laptop running a custom OS
A video camera containing old family videos
desires: I need to be recognised for my genius
I must get tougher than the bullies
I want to know what secrets are being kept from me
stuff: A calculator and a mechanical pencil
A geometry set and some marbles

name: Delinquent
description: Rough around the edges but hiding something deeper, Delinquents act tough and often break rules—but sometimes, it’s all just a shield.
desires: I need to hide my weakness
I must fight the world and win
I want to be totally independent
stuff: A laser pen and some change
An earring and a hair comb
A padlock with a matching key

name: Free Spirit
description: Creative, dreamy, and often seen as odd, Free Spirits bring joy and imagination wherever they go. They walk to their own rhythm.
special_items: A set of homemade tarot cards
desires: I need to make everyone happy
I must become a better role-model
I want someone to really understand me
stuff: A pair of DIY friendship bracelets
Incense sticks and a cute keyring
A handkerchief and a bag of jelly babies

name: Gamer
description: A master of strategy, reflexes, and high scores, Gamers always seek to prove themselves and level up—in games and in life.
desires: I need to unlock my full potential
I must prove I am the best
I want my parents to be proud of my achievements
stuff: A capsule toy and some arcade tokens
A pack of chewing gum and an energy drink
A set of trading cards and an ‘Action Replay’

name: Loner
description: Reserved and independent, Loners prefer solitude but often possess inner strength and perception that surprises others.
desires: I want to be left alone
I must protect myself from getting hurt
I need to learn to trust again
stuff: A pocket knife and old coin

name: Nerd
description: Passionate and enthusiastic about their interests, Nerds are often underestimated despite their focus and loyalty.
desires: I want to show everyone how awesome my fandom is
I need to prove I can be brave too
I must share my obsession with someone else

name: Popular Kid
description: Confident and stylish, Popular Kids often shine in social settings. But there's often more than meets the eye.
desires: I must always be liked
I want to discover who I really am
I need to stand out, no matter what

name: Rich Kid
description: Wealthy and resourceful, Rich Kids have access to incredible things—but may struggle with deeper connections.
type_feature: You Can Count On Me (and My Money)
desires: I want to prove I can survive on my own
I must be better than everyone else
I need to help others with my privilege

name: Shy Kid
description: Soft-spoken and sweet, Shy Kids may take time to open up, but have deep empathy and perception.
special_items: A music player with calming sounds
desires: I must make someone smile today
I want to stop being so afraid
I need to prove I’m brave

name: Sporty Kid
description: Energetic and goal-driven, Sporty Kids love physical challenges and know the value of teamwork.
desires: I must be the best there ever was
I want to win, fair and square
I need to prove I’m not just brawn

name: Theatre Kid
description: Dramatic and expressive, Theatre Kids bring passion and flair to everything they do.
type_feature: To Be or Not To Be
desires: I need to get the lead role
I want to be seen for who I am
I must write my own ending

name: Troublemaker
description: Always up to something, Troublemakers are chaotic forces of mischief with hearts of gold underneath.
desires: I want to pull the ultimate prank
I need someone to take me seriously
I must make things right… someday

name: Transfer Student
description: New to town, Transfer Students bring a fresh perspective and often have mysterious pasts.
desires: I want to fit in somewhere
I must keep my secret hidden
I need to make a new start
